member.name: T:StartupBridge.Storage.SettingsAccessor
member.remarks: Usable data types are shown at: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/uwp/design/app-settings/store-and-retrieve-app-data#types-of-app-data plus byte[] and Enum.

member.name: P:StartupBridge.PlatformInfo.IsPackaged
member.summary: Whether this assembly is packaged in AppX package

member.name: P:StartupBridge.StartupData.LastStartTime
member.remarks: The underlying value of this property will be updated when accessed the first time after system boot.

member.name: T:StartupBridge.StartupTaskBroker
member.remarks: This class wraps class which is only available on Windows 10 (Redstone 1, 1607 = version 10.0.14393.0) or newer.

member.name: M:StartupBridge.StartupTaskBroker.CanEnable(System.String)
member.summary: Whether the startup task for a specified AppX package can be enabled
member.returns: True if the startup task can be enabled

member.name: M:StartupBridge.StartupTaskBroker.IsEnabled(System.String)
member.summary: Whether the startup task for a specified AppX package has been enabled
member.returns: True if the startup task has been enabled

member.name: M:StartupBridge.StartupTaskBroker.Enable(System.String)
member.summary: Enables the startup task for a specified AppX package.
member.returns: True if the startup task is enabled

member.name: M:StartupBridge.StartupTaskBroker.Disable(System.String)
member.summary: Disables the startup task for a specified AppX package.
